about:
Sup guys? This is LolzLapiz of Avicus. 

I was introduced to this server from a friend. At first, I don't really like this server, but I started training my PVP skills here, and I am starting to find this fun.

You can usually find me in this server in these times-
(NOTE- all in Hong Kong time)

Mon- Thur- 4:00pm- 6:00pm
Saturdays- 3:00pm- 4:00pm

See you guys on the server!
